properties.validation-details-attribute-name:
/Num_Hospitalisation IS NOT NULL
AND /Id_patient IS NOT NULL
AND /identifiant_organisation IS NOT NULL
AND /Code_diag IS NOT NULL
AND /Temps_ID IS NOT NULL
AND /Localisation_ID IS NOT NULL

properties.distinctQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
  num_hospitalisation,
  id_patient,
  identifiant_organisation,
  code_diagnostic,
  suite_diagnostic_consultation,
  year(date_entree) as annee, month(date_entree) as mois
  jour_hospitalisation
FROM FLOWFILE
WHERE Id_patient IS NOT NULL
  AND identifiant_organisation IS NOT NULL
  AND code_diagnostic IS NOT NULL

attributes-to-ignore-regex.name: attributes-to-ignore-regex
attributes-to-ignore-regex.displayName: Attributes to Ignore by Regular Expression

attributes-to-log-regex.name: attributes-to-log-regex
attributes-to-log-regex.displayName: Attributes to Log by Regular Expression

properties.Replacement Value:
INSERT INTO fait_hospitalisation (
    num_Hospitalisation,
    id_patient,
    identifiant_organisation,
    code_diag,
    temps_ID,
)
VALUES (
    '${num_Hospitalisation}',
    '${id_patient}',
    '${identifiant_organisation}',
    '${code_diag}',
    '${annee}' + '${mois}'
);

labels.label: Entrepôt de données (processus pour récupérer les données JSON et les envoyer en requête SQL)
